trends: There have been no other sightings in South Bloomfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was heading south on St. Rte 104, about a half mile south of St. Rte 762. I noticed 5-6 lights in a line west of Chillicothe. I remember looking for a plane thinking that they were flares, but saw none. They exactly like the Phoenix lights and as I got closer to Circleville they started to disappear.
